question: How would you prefer to keep in touch with friends?
When talking with friends, what proportion of your time do you spend talking about the following:
answers: Hobbies and interests (e.g. sport, TV, music, cinema, fashion, holidays, gardening, DIY etc.
Personal matters (e.g. life choice matters, arguments, feelings)
What you've been doing since the last time you spoke

question: At social occasions, when you meet someone for the first time, how likely are you to talk about the following.
answers: Hobbies and interests (e.g. sport, TV, music, cinema, fashion, holidays, gardening, DIY etc.
Personal matters (e.g. life choice matters, arguments, feelings)
